welcome.title: Hello, Welcome to Popcorn Time!
welcome.body: Hello, Welcome to PopcornTime. Your personal movies and series database.

path.title: Media Directory
path.tooltip: Provide the path to the directory where you keep all your movies and series.
path.placeholder: Select the path to your Movies and Series

organize.title: Organize into folders
organize.tooltip: If this is checked, we reorganize all your movies and series into their proper folders.

poster.title: Auto fill posters
poster.tooltip: If this is checked, the poster of movies and series will be filled by a frame from the media.
